translation:
Most Illustrious Sir,

The Government orders that Your Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Guedes and the person competently authorized by João Pedro Ramirez, deliver the portion of beef cattle and breeding stock that it is possible to separate from the farms of the enemies of the Republic, in order that the said Ramirez be reimbursed, as appropriate, for the value of the goods he supplied to the army; and for this reason, the delivery to which I refer is strongly recommended to him, amounting to at least 4 to 5 thousand head of cattle.

In the receipt to be demanded upon delivery of the cattle, the number of fat and lean steers, the number of fat and lean cows, the number of bulls for breeding, and finally the number of breeding stock must be specified, because all these categories have different prices.

God preserve Your Excellency  
Secretary of Finance Affairs in Piratini, January 22, 1839  
Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima,  
General Commander of Police of the Municipality of Alegrete.

January 22, 1839  
Minister of Finance  
Secretariat of the Republic

Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima,  
General Commander of Police of the Municipality of Alegrete.  
From the Minister of Finance.
